message: The team is walking onto the field to start the match. It is a large and passionate crowd.
The players are acknowledging the crowd and are visibly excited to start the game.
The players are greeting each other and sharing some lighthearted moments before the match.

A group of players in green jerseys with the words "1XBET" on their shirts are walking off the field. The commentators are talking about the road safety week series and the importance of raising awareness about road safety.

A person in the crowd is wearing a wig with red, blue, and yellow hair. The wig is on top of their bare head. The person is waving the Indian flag in the crowd. The commentators are still talking about the importance of road safety.
The crowd is waving the Indian flag.  They are very excited and cheering. The commentators are talking about the number of road accidents that take place all over India.
The match is taking place in India and the crowd is cheering. Two umpires, Rajesh Deshpande and Virender Kumar are walking towards the pitch.
The umpires are walking towards the pitch and the crowd is cheering. They are going to officiate the match.
The umpires are walking towards the pitch with a trophy in the middle of the walkway. They are going to officiate the match.
The two teams met last year. India batted first and scored 204 for 3. Suchint Tendulkar led the way with 60 off 37. He also picked up a couple of wickets. In the end, South Africa won this match.
Two of the Durban Super Giants players are having a conversation with each other. They had only managed to post 148 runs and they're looking to set a bigger total.
Two players in blue are walking onto the field, with fireworks going off around them, to start their batting innings. One player has a helmet on, the other doesn't, both have bats.
Two players are walking towards the pitch, and one of them is wearing pads. They're getting ready to bat.
The players are walking out to the field. They are ready to start their innings.

The players are talking to each other. They are getting ready for the match. The commentator is talking about Sachin Tendulkar, who recently retired from international and first-class cricket. He says that he is active in the scene. He has played well in the legend series, and the people are here to watch him bat.

A wide shot of the stadium. Sachin Tendulkar's T20 career stats are displayed on the screen. The commentator says that he is one cricketer who always prepares, and he is sure he has done that even for this season,  even for the road safety
The score is 114 for 5 wickets lost. The batsman is playing a defensive shot. The bowler is bowling a good length delivery and the batsman is waiting for a good ball to hit.
The batsman is playing a defensive shot. The bowler is bowling a good length delivery and the batsman is waiting for a good ball to hit.
The batsman is playing a defensive shot. The bowler is bowling a good length delivery and the batsman is waiting for a good ball to hit.
The batsman has scored 118 runs and has a best of 94. He has been playing in cricket tournaments. The commentary is highlighting the player's career statistics.
A player is shown in the video, getting ready to bat. The commentary is saying he is in form.
Garnett Kruger, the bowler, is shown walking towards the pitch. The commentator is talking about how Kruger loves to get on the field.
The first ball is bowled by Garnett Kruger to the batsman, Stuart Binny.  Kruger bowls a straight ball, Stuart Binny defends the ball.  The score remains 0 runs for 0 wickets.
Garnett Kruger bowls the second ball, the ball goes down the leg side, Binny  doesn't go for the shot, The score remains 0 runs for 0 wickets.
The score remains 0 runs for 0 wickets.
The score is 1 - 0. The batsman on strike is N Ojha and the non-striker is Sachin Tendulkar. The bowler is Kruger. A pretty attacking field set here by the South African Legends.
The first ball of the match is bowled by Kruger to Ojha.  It's a wide delivery and Ojha has no shot at it. The umpire signals a wide ball.
This is match one of season two.  It's a big game: India Legends versus South Africa Legends.
The batsman is standing at the crease. The bowler is running in to bowl. The bowler bowls a good line and length ball, the batsman leaves the ball and the score is 0-1 after 0.1 overs.
The bowler is looking intense, he is putting a lot of effort to get the batsman out.  The batsman is still at the crease. The score is still 0-1 after 0.1 overs.
The bowler is running in to bowl again, he bowls a good ball, the batsman leaves the ball. The score is still 0-1 after 0.1 overs.
The score is 0-0 for South Africa legends after 0.2 overs. The batsman is  Kruger and the bowler is Ojha. Ojha is bowling a right arm off-break and has gotten into a good rhythm.
The batsman, Kruger, is facing the bowler, Ojha.  Ojha is bowling a right arm off break.  The score is 0-0 for South Africa legends after 0.2 overs.
The score is 0-0 for South Africa legends after 0.2 overs. The batsman is  Kruger and the bowler is Ojha. The batsman Kruger and the bowler, Ojha, both are right hand batsman.

The batsman Kruger is on strike. The bowler is Jonty Rhodes. The score is 0-1. The over is 0.3. Jonty Rhodes bowls a wide ball, the batsman hits a cut shot towards the point region, a fielder dives to his left but the ball goes for a wide.

The batsman Kruger is on strike. The bowler is Jonty Rhodes. The score is 0-1. The over is 0.3. Jonty Rhodes bowls a slower ball, the batsman Kruger hits a cut shot to the point region, the fielder Jonty Rhodes dives to his left but the ball goes for four runs.

The batsman Kruger is on strike. The bowler is Jonty Rhodes. The score is 0-5. The over is 0.3. Jonty Rhodes bowls a delivery outside off, the batsman plays a defensive shot. Jonty Rhodes bowls another delivery, the batsman plays a defensive shot.
The batsman plays a shot that goes for a boundary. The score is now 4 - 0. The batsman, N Ojha, is on 4 runs, and the bowler, Kruger, has bowled 0.4 overs.

The batsman, N Ojha, is on strike. The bowler bowls a short delivery. The batsman pulls the ball towards deep square leg. The ball goes for a boundary. The score is now 5 - 0. The batsman, N Ojha, is on 4 runs, and the bowler, Kruger, has bowled 0.4 overs.

The batsman is on strike. The bowler bowls a short delivery. The batsman pulls the ball towards deep square leg. The ball goes for a boundary. The score is now 5 - 0. The batsman, N Ojha, is on 4 runs, and the bowler, Kruger, has bowled 0.4 overs.

The batsman hits the ball towards the fine leg and the fielder is moving to square leg to field the ball. There are only 3 fielders outside the 30-yard circle. The current score is 5-0 and India Legends are batting first. It is the 0.4th over.

The bowler bowls a delivery just outside off stump and the batsman hits the ball to the leg side and the fielder is out on the leg side. It is the 0.4th over.

The bowler is about to bowl. He bowls a delivery and the batsman hits the ball back to the bowler who then throws the ball to the wicketkeeper.  The current score is 5-4 and India Legends are batting first. It is the 0.4th over.
The score is 5-0. The bowler Kruger bowls a wide ball. The batsman is Tendulkar and is looking to hit the ball off of the back foot.
The bowler, Kruger, bowls a much better line. Tendulkar hits a four by hitting the ball off of the pads through the leg side. The crowd goes wild and the players on the bench react positively.
The score is now 0-4 in favour of India Legends. The commentators discuss how Kruger started off poorly, but ended the over in a good fashion.
The score is 9-0, the first over is done, India Legends are batting, the bowler Kruger bowled two boundaries in the first over.
Tendulkar is at the crease and he is talking to his partner. The next bowler is Botha, the score is still 9-0.

The batsman is facing the bowler. The bowler is running in to bowl. The bowler bowls the ball. The batsman hits the ball to the offside. It's a dot ball. The score is still 0-0 in the 1st over. The bowler is running in to bowl again.

A woman in a white shirt and a turban is sitting in the stands. She is watching the game. The game is continuing. The bowler is running in to bowl again. The batsman hits the ball to the offside. It's another dot ball. The score is still 0-0 in the 1st over.

The woman in the stands is still watching the game. The bowler is running in to bowl again. The batsman hits the ball to the off-side. It's another dot ball. The score is still 0-0 in the 1st over. The bowler is running in to bowl again.

The score is 9-0, first over, India Legends are batting. The bowler is Johan Botha, a right-arm off break bowler. He's playing in this world series event for the first time. It was his debut against India way back in 2005. He's a very handy crafty off spinner and the batsman is Sachin Tendulkar who has experience of playing in various leagues. The bowler bowls a ball and Tendulkar tries to hit a cover drive, the ball is deflected by the fielder.
Sachin Tendulkar is up against Johan Botha. Sachin hits the ball with a booming cover drive which is deflected by the fielder for 1 run. The score is now 9-1.
The replay shows Sachin's shot. He timed it perfectly.

The score is 14-0, South African Legends are batting. The bowler is N. Ojha and the batsman is Botha. Botha missed the off-drive shot as the ball missed the bat completely. The batsman walks off the pitch, still looking to get off the mark. He is the type of player who can catch up quite easily.

Sachin Tendulkar is at the crease, the score is 14-0, and it is the second ball of the first over. Tendulkar tries to tuck the ball away but it is going onto his pads. It is going to be an inside edge and the umpire is going to call it leg by. It is a leg bye. Tendulkar has gotten off the mark now.
The score is 15-0, it is the third ball of the first over. Tendulkar has played a big inside edge, and the ball is dribbling out to the off-side.

The batsman Johan Botha hits a shot on the off side and tries to take a run. He is just about to reach the crease as the ball is picked up by the fielder.  He tries to dive and the ball just manages to get past his fingertips. The score is still 0 for 0 in 0.4 overs.

The batsman Johan Botha tries to hit the ball, but it is a bit too high for him to hit cleanly. He gets a bit of bat on the ball, but it goes straight back to the bowler. The bowler tries to run him out, but the batsman is able to make it back safely. The score is still 0 for 0 in 0.4 overs.

The batsman Johan Botha is on strike. Tendulkar plays a shot off the third ball and it goes to the boundary for four runs. The score is now 27-0. The bowler is Kruger and he is bowling a fast delivery.  Tendulkar plays a shot off the ball and it goes to the boundary for four runs. The crowd is cheering for Tendulkar.

The second ball of the over is a fuller delivery. Tendulkar steps out of the crease and hits the ball, but it goes straight to the wicketkeeper. The wicketkeeper tries to catch the ball, but it goes through his gloves. The score is still 38-0. Van Der Wath is trying to get his rhythm back.

The score is 43-0 in 4.3 overs. Tendulkar is on 13 runs. The batsman hits the ball over the top for a boundary. This shot is unusual from Tendulkar as he typically plays these shots on the ground. The batsman is looking pleased with his shot.

The batsman hits the ball between mid off and cover. It is a different type of shot than Tendulkar normally plays. The batsman is preparing to hit the ball. The batsman hits the ball. The batsman is running.
